name: The Robotic Trolley Problem
description:
In "The Robotic Trolley Problem" you play as a character stuck in a selfdriving car during a robot apocalypse. The only way to control the car is using a MultiGun, a device that randomly changes between modes.

"The Robotic Trolley Problem" is an endless arcade game.

The Controls are explained ingame.

If the web version lags or doesn't work, you can use trolleydownload.zip and play it that way.
